title: Complaining about range anxiety
context: Worry out loud that your electric car battery will die before you get home.

content.bestLine: I'm worried my electric car will die before I get home

neutral.text: I'm getting a bit anxious about my battery level
My car's range is a concern for this trip
I hope I can make it home without running out of charge
Range anxiety is really getting to me
I'm not sure if I'll have enough juice to get home
My electric car's battery is making me nervous
I wish I had a longer range on this car
I'm keeping an eye on my battery level

informal.text: I'm freaking out about my car dying on the road
I'm low key worried about my battery
I hope I don't get stranded with a dead car
I'm so done with range anxiety
I'm stressing about making it to the next charging station
I'm trying not to think about my battery level
I just want to make it home without any issues

slang.text: I'm hella worried about my whip dying on me
My ride's got me feeling hella anxious about the range
I'm low on juice and high on anxiety
I'm ghosting my car's battery life
My electric car's got me feeling extra salty about the range
I'm trying to stay turnt up about my car's battery

patterns.meaning: expressing concern about the car's range
describing the impact of the car's range on the speaker's emotions

dialogs.description: Talking to a friend about range anxiety

lines.speaker: Person A
lines.text: I'm getting a bit anxious about my battery level

lines.speaker: Person B
lines.text: Don't worry, you'll make it home fine

dialogs.description: Discussing range anxiety with a stranger

lines.speaker: Person A
lines.text: I'm low key worried about my car dying on the road

lines.speaker: Person B
lines.text: Yeah, I feel you, I've been there too
